quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and The Great Escape
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, mccallum, vizzini. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chin

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To bluff

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Does Cal marry Carley in the movie Talladega Nights?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: What is the name of the cougar that rides with Ricky in the movie Talladega Nights?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Karen

questions.question: In the movie Talladega Nights, what does Ricky think after he crashes?

options.text: that he is being chased by a gorilla

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: that he is on fire

questions.question: In the movie Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby, Rickys wife, Carley, says, If we wanted two wussies, we would have named them Billy Bob and Ethel.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Between which characters from the movie A Cinderella Story does this conversation take place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Austin and Sam

questions.question: Who directed the 2006 movie Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Adam McKay

questions.question: These lines from the movie A Cinderella Story were delivered by Fiona and addressed to Gabriela:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Does Cal get a new nickname before he marries Carley in Talladega Nights?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: In the scene of the movie A Cinderella Story where Austin, Shelby, and all their friends come into the diner for a pre-dance meal, Sam is asked to serve them. When she comes back with their order, Austin is the only one left. Even though the gang didnt eat, Austin offers to pay Sam anyway.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Sams father dies in an earthquake at the beginning of the film A Cinderella Story, but before he does, he gives Sam some advice on how to deal with the pressures of life. What was his motto?

options.text: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
Keep your friends close and your enemies closer.
Dont give up, even when the going gets tough.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.

questions.question: In the movie Talladega Nights, Ricky Bobby is a member of what team?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dennit Racing

questions.question: Which of these did the old woman NOT call Princess Buttercup in the film The Princess Bride?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Garbage

questions.question: Finish the quote from the movie A Cinderella Story: Carter, you could have totally made that light! FYI Sam, yellow means slow down, not speed up. ___________

options.text: I knew that. I wasnt born yesterday.
You still couldve made the light.
If Fiona gets to the diner before I do, I am SO dead.
I need the Fast and the Furious, not Driving Miss Daisy.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: I need the Fast and the Furious, not Driving Miss Daisy.

questions.question: Hilary Duffs character, Sam, is the Cinderella in the movie A Cinderella Story. What are the names of Sams twisted stepsisters?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brianna and Gabriela

questions.question: In the movie Talladega Nights, Ricky drives his car into a buggy and a policeman.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: garbage cans

questions.question: Complete the following line from the film Stripes:

options.text: ptain Stillman: [talking to himself; looking through binoculars, spying on female soldiers taking showers] Oh, God, I wish I was a ______.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: loofah

questions.question: In the movie Stripes, Colonel Glass interrupts Captain Stillman as he is spying on the female soldiers showering.

options.text: l. Glass: I have a problem, and I need your help. Are you familiar with the EM-50 project we have in Italy?
ptain Stillman: Yes... its a tank... or something.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: an Urban Assault

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 10

All the plants are gonna die!

questions.question: Winger is driving his cab at the beginning of the movie Stripes.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: *willing to learn*

questions.question: The new recruits in the comedy movie Stripes are taking turns introducing themselves in the barracks:

options.text: uiser: I joined the army cause my father and my brother were in the army. I thought Id better join before I got drafted.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sargeant Hulka

questions.question: In the movie Stripes, John Wingers best friend Russell Ziskey (played by Harold Ramis) arrives at Wingers house after Wingers girlfriend dumps him and leaves.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: job, apartment, car, girlfriend
